verses.verse: Thou <WG4771> therefore,<WG3767> my<WG3450> son,<WG5043> be strong<WG1743> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

And <WG2532> the things that<WG3739> thou hast heard<WG191> of<WG3844> me<WG1700> among<WG1223> many<WG4183> witnesses,<WG3144> the same<WG5023> commit<WG3908> thou to faithful<WG4103> men,<WG444> who<WG3748> shall be<WG2071> able<WG2425> to teach<WG1321> others<WG2087> also.<WG2532>
Thou <WG4771> therefore<WG3767> endure hardness,<WG2553> as<WG5613> a good<WG2570> soldier<WG4757> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
No man<WG3762> that warreth<WG4754> entangleth himself with<WG1707> the<WG3588> affairs<WG4230> of this life;<WG979> that<WG2443> he may please<WG700> him who hath chosen him to be a soldier.<WG4758>
And <WG1161> if<WG1437> a man<WG5100> also<WG2532> strive for masteries,<WG118> yet is he not<WG3756> crowned,<WG4737> except<WG3362> he strive<WG118> lawfully.<WG3545>
The husbandman<WG1092> that laboreth<WG2872> must<WG1163> be first partaker<WG3335> <WG4413> of the<WG3588> fruits.<WG2590>
Consider <WG3539> what<WG3739> I say;<WG3004> and<WG1063> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> give<WG1325> thee<WG4671> understanding<WG4907> in<WG1722> all things.<WG3956>
Remember <WG3421> that Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> of<WG1537> the seed<WG4690> of David<WG1138> was raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498> according<WG2596> to my<WG3450> gospel: <WG2098>
Wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> I suffer trouble,<WG2553> as<WG5613> an evil doer,<WG2557> even unto<WG3360> bonds;<WG1199> but<WG235> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> is not<WG3756> bound.<WG1210>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I endure<WG5278> all things<WG3956> for the elect's sakes,<WG1223> <WG3588> <WG1588> that<WG2443> they<WG846> may also<WG2532> obtain<WG5177> the salvation<WG4991> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> with<WG3326> eternal<WG166> glory.<WG1391>
It is a faithful<WG4103> saying:<WG3056> For<WG1063> if<WG1487> we be dead with<WG4880> him, we shall also<WG2532> live with<WG4800> him:
If <WG1487> we suffer,<WG5278> we shall also<WG2532> reign with<WG4821> him: if<WG1487> we deny<WG720> him, he also<WG2548> will deny<WG720> us: <WG2248>
If <WG1487> we believe not,<WG569> yet he<WG1565> abideth<WG3306> faithful:<WG4103> he cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> deny<WG720> himself.<WG1438>

Of these things<WG5023> put them in remembrance,<WG5279> charging<WG1263> them before<WG1799> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> that they strive not about words<WG3054> <WG3361> to no profit,<WG1519> <WG3762> <WG5539> but to<WG1909> the subverting<WG2692> of the<WG3588> hearers.<WG191>

Study <WG4704> to show<WG3936> thyself<WG4572> approved<WG1384> unto God,<WG2316> a workman<WG2040> that needeth not to be ashamed,<WG422> rightly dividing<WG3718> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of truth.<WG225>
But <WG1161> shun<WG4026> profane<WG952> and vain babblings:<WG2757> for<WG1063> they will increase<WG4298> unto<WG1909> more<WG4119> ungodliness.<WG763>
And <WG2532> their<WG846> word<WG3056> will eat<WG2192> <WG3542> as<WG5613> doth a canker:<WG1044> of whom<WG3739> is<WG2076> Hymenaeus<WG5211> and<WG2532> Philetus;<WG5372>

Who <WG3748> concerning<WG4012> the<WG3588> truth<WG225> have erred,<WG795> saying<WG3004> that the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> is past<WG1096> already;<WG2235> and<WG2532> overthrow<WG396> the<WG3588> faith<WG4102> of some.<WG5100>

Nevertheless <WG3305> the foundation<WG2310> of God<WG2316> standeth<WG2476> sure,<WG4731> having<WG2192> this<WG5026> seal,<WG4973> The Lord<WG2962> knoweth<WG1097> them that are<WG5607> his.<WG848> And,<WG2532> Let every one<WG3956> that nameth<WG3687> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of Christ<WG5547> depart<WG868> from<WG575> iniquity.<WG93>

But <WG1161> in<WG1722> a great<WG3173> house<WG3614> there are<WG2076> not<WG3756> only<WG3440> vessels<WG4632> of gold<WG5552> and<WG2532> of silver,<WG693> but<WG235> also<WG2532> of wood<WG3585> and<WG2532> of earth;<WG3749> and<WG2532> some<WG3739> <WG3303> to<WG1519> honor,<WG5092> and<WG1161> some<WG3739> to<WG1519> dishonor.<WG819>

If <WG1437> a man<WG5100> therefore<WG3767> purge<WG1571> himself<WG1438> from<WG575> these,<WG5130> he shall be<WG2071> a vessel<WG4632> unto<WG1519> honor,<WG5092> sanctified,<WG37> and<WG2532> meet for the master's use,<WG2173> <WG3588> <WG1203> and prepared<WG2090> unto<WG1519> every<WG3956> good<WG18> work.<WG2041>

Flee <WG5343> also<WG1161> youthful<WG3512> lusts:<WG1939> but<WG1161> follow<WG1377> righteousness,<WG1343> faith,<WG4102> charity,<WG26> peace,<WG1515> with<WG3326> them that call on<WG1941> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> out of<WG1537> a pure<WG2513> heart.<WG2588>
But <WG1161> foolish<WG3474> and<WG2532> unlearned<WG521> questions<WG2214> avoid,<WG3868> knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> they do engender<WG1080> strifes.<WG3163>
And <WG1161> the servant<WG1401> of the Lord<WG2962> must<WG1163> not<WG3756> strive;<WG3164> but<WG235> be<WG1511> gentle<WG2261> unto<WG4314> all<WG3956> men, apt to teach,<WG1317> patient,<WG420>

In <WG1722> meekness<WG4236> instructing<WG3811> those that oppose themselves;<WG475> if God peradventure<WG3379> <WG2316> will give<WG1325> them<WG846> repentance<WG3341> to<WG1519> the acknowledging<WG1922> of the truth;<WG225>

And <WG2532> that they may recover themselves<WG366> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> snare<WG3803> of the<WG3588> devil,<WG1228> who are taken captive<WG2221> by<WG5259> him<WG846> at<WG1519> his<WG1565> will.<WG2307>
